postcontent:
I have less than 50 rounds through this pistol, Please email for pictures.

The STI Sentry is a traditional 1911-style pistol built to modern, high-end standards for an exceptional competition, duty, and self-defense pistol.  With Bomar-style adjustable sights and stainless steel ambidextrous thumb safeties, this gun is ready to compete in either IPSC or IDPA matches right out of the box.

Crafted with classic 1911 design, the STI International Sentry is a traditional 1911 built to modern high-end standards for an exceptional competition, duty, and self-defense pistol. With Bomar style adjustable sights, it is ready to compete in either IPSC or IDPA right out of the box.

The Sentry is built on a forged steel, government length, standard width frame. The frame includes a checkered front strap, checkered mainspring housing, and blended magwell. The controls are STI International’s stainless steel ambidextrous thumb safeties and knuckle relief high-rise beavertail grip safety. The slide features traditional 1911 styling with STI front and rear cocking serrations and oversized ejection port. The barrel is 5.0″ ramped and supported with a match grade fitted bushing. This excellent firearm comes standard with an STI commander hammer, patented STI trigger system, STI S-7 sear, and titanium strut for smooth, reliable function.

This pistol has now been discontinued.

title: For Sale:  Ruger SR9C Compact 9mm pistol SS #3313
postcontent: Up for sale is brand new in case never fired Ruger SR9C Compact 9mm pistol SS #3313Call or text Joe @ (602) 3 six one 7 2 seven 3 or email REDACTEDThe SR9c compact pistol weighs in at 23.40 oz. and features an overall length of 6.85", a height of 4.61", and the same slim 1.27" grip width (across safety levers) as the full-sized SR9. It comes with two magazines that provide options in both capacity and grip size. The standard magazine holds 10 rounds and features a flat bottom butt plate; a finger grip extension floor plate is also included. The second magazine features a grip adapter and holds 17 rounds, instantly transforming the smaller, compact grip into a full-sized 9mm grip. The 3.50" barreled pistol features an integral accessory rail that accommodates most lights and lasers. The SR9c compact pistol utilizes the same adjustable, high-visibility 3-Dot sight system as its full-sized predecessor, setting it apart from many compact pistols that rely on fixed sights. New serrations are located on the front portion of the slide, making it easier to both manipulate the slide and to press check the chamber. The SR9c is available with a glass-filled nylon frame and through-hardened slide in either a brushed stainless or black nitrite finish. State compliant variations are available where necessary and ship with two 10-round magazines.Just like the original, full-sized SR9, the SR9c is loaded with modern safety features like a 1911-style ambidextrous manual safety, internal trigger bar interlock and striker blocker, trigger safety, magazine disconnect, plus a visual and tactile loaded chamber indicator.

title: For Sale/Trade:  Olympic Arms 45 ACP AR Pistol--$875
postcontent:
I'm selling my 45 ACP AR pistol that has a "dedicated" Olympic Arms complete upper with an 8.5 inch barrel with a 7 inch free float quad hand rail. The upper comes with flip up polymer sights, metal tactical light, Barska GLX green dot laser, and Sig Sauer STS-081 red dot sight with end cap covers mounted on a quick detachable riser. The light & laser both use the single CR123 batteries for easier purchasing and matching of power supply. The photos are not updated with the new tactical light & laser, but are mounted separately on the quad handrail. The Olympic Arms lower is a standard AR-15 lower receiver that has a Rodgers magazine well funnel fore grip with finger grooves, the longest buffer tube on the AR market (9 1/8 inches long) with a rubber cap on the end, Hogue rubber pistol grip, ambidextrous single point sling attachment end plate, and utilizes the 10 round modified UZI/IMI Israeli style magazine (with an adapter block welded on the back of it) which comes with a total of 4 magazines (and locks open to the rear after the last round is fired). This lower can be used with any other AR platform and the buffer tube is set up for the future installation of a SIG TAC Brace (if the new owner wants it that way). With the long buffer tube installed, it makes it easier to have a good place for a cheek placement when sighting in and firing at the range without your face too close to the sights.

 If you have inquiries or questions, all that I ask is that you would respect the seller’s wishes when the questions/inquiries are answered. What I am asking is--please don't low ball my selling price for any outrageous offer--the price is $875 FIRM or trade for the pistol described in the ad. For NC residents, you will need a photo copy of your NC driver’s license, your NC CCW permit, and sign a bill of sale along with a photo copy of my NC driver’s license and NC CCW permit. All NC laws and ATF laws apply in this transaction. If you’re looking for an FFL transfer and shipping, then the extra costs will apply to the buyer. This AR pistol was my second build to own and loved it ever since. My son and I (both of us former military) have taken this firearm to the indoor range, along with my other AR pistols, and shot this with great performance. This is not the first time that I've sold other firearms of mine. I don't have to sell this item, but since I own many other AR pistols in different calibers, I'd figure that I'd give a try out on the website. You can email me for more details or questions. I thank you for your time and inquiries.

title: For Sale:  GSG-522 PK5 .22 LR custom package, pistol or carbine, lots of extras
postcontent:
ATI GSG-522 PK5 pistol/carbine package. Very excellent condition weapon with original hard case and all original documentation/manuals, tools, except trigger lock [a real loss for sure. lol]. Also has muzzle brake, barrel cap, etc. ATI clone of the H and K pistol/rifle. You dont see these very often in the pistol configuration as most were made as carbines. This one can be either.

Extras include: New stainless 16" carbine barrel, 4-position ATI metal sliding stock [not the cheap plastic crap for airsoft] 1-10 round original magazine, 5-22 round GSG magazines, 1-110 round GSG drum magazine [new], new BSA Red-dot sight, heavy duty clip on bungee lanyard, and new aircraft aluminum faux silencer with internal steel tube, thread adapter and threaded cap for the pistol configuration. Adds nice balance on the front end.
I also have the original pistol barrel and rear butt cap for the pistol configuration as it would be illegal to use the sliding stock with the pistol barrel. All three takedown screws have been replaced with HK style push pins for much faster takedown without tools
.
I have the complete cap screw replacement set for this gun as well as a 4-part video showing the complete teardown and screw replacement order. Changing the barrel including re-sighting the BSA takes about 15-20 minutes and uses one allen wrench. I have replaced the screws necessary to change the barrel. I have not replaced the rest. I will include all original screws and the original three screw pairs I replaced with push pins.
Fun gun for the plinker. Surprisingly accurate as a pistol to the 25 or so yards we had it sighted in at. Very accurate with the 16 inch barrel. Red dot works better than I expected, even in strong light.

Asking what I have in it. No longer interested in trades except possibly silver bullion or 308 semi-auto.  Cash talks!!  Try me. You cant hurt my feelings. Nor can you steal it. Stupid lo-ball offers and questions about whether it is still for sale go in the spam bucket. thanx

title: For Sale:  PSA 14.7" AR-15 5.56mm mid-length Upper with pinned flash hider
postcontent:
This is a slightly used upper from Palmetto State Armory, only about 60 rounds through this one.  I had the flash hider pinned so this probably the most compact and lightweight upper you could put on your AR and still be legal (14.7" + perm attached A2 Flash hider is 16").  It has the mid-length gas system and chrome lined barrel.  It does not come with a bolt but it will come with the charging handle.  Below is the description from PSA, they use an excellent barrel made by FN.  Call or text Josh @ (860) 670-419five


PSA 14.7" CHF Mid-length Lightweight - Unpinned - Without BCG or Charging Handle




Be the first to review this product




Barrel length 14.7" 
Hammer Forged Barrel 
Machine Gun Steel 
5.56 Nato Chamber 
1 in 7" twist 
Double-thick Chrome-lined bore and chamber 
High pressure tested
Magnetic particle inspected 
Lightweight profile 
M4 feedramps 
Forged upper 
T-marks

This upper is not pinned and welded, all NFA rules apply.

SKU: 42433
Barrel:  A proprietary blend of Hammer forged chrome molly vanadium made by FN that is referred to as "Machine Gun Steel" by virtue of its use in FN's M249 and M240 weapons.   The hammer forging process work hardens the steel, making it more durable.  In addition, the chrome process for the bore allows for a lining almost twice as thick as a standard M16 for enhanced durability.  Chambered in 5.56 NATO, with a 1/7 twist, M4 barrel extension, and a mid-length gas system.     Barrel is High Pressure tested, and Magnetic Particle inspected, to ensure quality and dependability, and is finished off with an F-marked front sight post with sling swivel, standard hand guards and an A2 flash hider. 

This upper is not pinned and welded, all NFA rules apply.

Upper: Forged 7075-T6 A3 AR upper is made to MIL-SPECS and hard coat anodized black for durability. Featuring machined T marks, and a mil-spec finish. These uppers are made for us right here in the USA by a mil-spec manufacturer.

Each upper is assembled to order with care, and test fired.

*Please allow up to 15 business days for your Complete Assembled Upper to ship from our facility.  Holiday and special lead times can be longer*

Signature required on delivery.

title: For Sale:  APEX S&W M&P ALUMINUM FORWARD SET SEAR KIT  100-067  856008005147
postcontent: Dropping this kit into your S&W M&P will set the trigger break point farther forward than the factory trigger assembly as well as significantly reduce the uptake and over travel (varies). It produces a trigger pull as close to a 1911 trigger as possible in a polymer frame pistol. The Forward Set Trigger body is machined from aircraft grade aluminum and black hard anodized to last a lifetime. The flat faced trigger comes assembled with a center pivoting safety. The Forward Set Sear & Trigger Kit boasts a smooth trigger pull throughout the break. The kit comes with 2 trigger return springs; one designed to produce a 4lb trigger pull, and one to produce a 5.5lb trigger pull. These two options give the end user the ability to customize their trigger pull for their specific needs.

title: For Sale:  Walther AC43 P38
postcontent:

postcontent: Seller Stock #: HGMOS22BHere is a Sig Arms Mosquito, .22 LR Caliber pistol with 10 shot magazine, made exactly on the lines of its center fire siblings. Manufacturer is SIG Sauer GmbH of Eckernförde, Germany, or its subcontractor. Importer and warrantor is Sig Sauer of Exeter, N.H. Construction is steel inner barrel, hammer, breech face firing pin bushing, levers, and internal parts with alloy slide and magazine body; and polymer frame, trigger, grips, front sight, and magazine base plate. The Mosquito is blowback semi auto rimfire, traditional double and single action, and its safety consists of an ambidextrous hammer block. The safety lever does not decock the Mosquito, but it can be safely decocked by pulling the trigger with the safety engaged. The Mosquito also has a magazine safety and a keyed internal lock. It is furnished with one magazine. Factory Code is MOS-22-B. Frame is rail type, with a 3 slot Picatinny or Weaver size rail area built into its front section. Barrel is two piece steel, 3.9 inch, 1:16 six groove right hand rifling. Sights are stake on polymer front, with dovetailed steel and alloy windage only adjustable rear, in a green three dot configuration. Trigger is .375 smooth faced, and pulls in the 8 pound vicinity on single action with minimal felt creep. Overall length is 7 1/4 inches from the muzzle to the end of the grip frame strut; height is 5 1/4 inches from the top of the rear sight to the bottom of the magazine floorplate. Slide thickness is .935 at the port, with grip thickness of 1.23 inches. Weight empty is 24.7 ounces. Each mosquito comes in its factory case with instruction manual, factory registration papers, extra replacement front sight, and lock key. title: For Sale:  Night Hawk 1911 T4 9mm
postcontent:
The 9mm cartridge in a 1911 designed for concealed carry may be the best of both worlds when it comes to muzzle controllability and magazine capacity in a 1911. The T4 contains some of the most evolutionary features. The T4 resembles the popular T3, but on a 3.8” barrel platform. Reliability was the most important consideration when plans for the new pistol began, hence the 3.8” Nighthawk match grade barrel over the more popular but less reliable 3.5” or shorter barrel. The frame is thinned just like Nighthawks popular Lady Hawk. The proprietary barrel is crowned and recessed with the slide. On the outside, the front of the slide has cuts designed to reduce weight. They taper in towards the crowned barrel, giving a unique look to the T4 like no other handgun produced by Nighthawk. Grips are like the T3 and are thinned for less bulk.
 
Barrel length is 3.8”
 

Stainless Steel Frame Standard
Black Nitride Finish
Tritium Dot Front Night Sight
Heinie Slant Pro Straight Eight Rear Night Sight
 Bull Barrel
Single-Side Safety
9mm only
